text: A Man Called Sledge is a 1970 Italian western movie directed by Vic Morrow (who also stars) and starring James Garner, Dennis Weaver, Claude Akins, Wayde Preston, John Marley, Laura Antonelli, Ken Clark, Tony Young. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1970 movies Category:1970s Western (genre) movies Category:Italian Western (genre) movies
title: A Man Called Sledge
